title: Back pain (muscle strain)

fields.name: activity_advice
fields.label: Activity advice
fields.default: Keep moving gently; avoid heavy lifting for a few days.

body:
You were treated today for back pain due to a muscle strain.

Pain control:
{{analgesia_plan}}

{{#if activity_advice}}Activity advice: {{activity_advice}}

{{/if}}Return to ED urgently if you develop:
- New weakness, numbness, or bowel/bladder changes
- Severe or worsening pain not controlled by medication
- Fever or unexplained weight loss

Follow-up: {{followup_timeframe}}.
disclaimer: This letter is general advice and does not replace follow-up with your usual clinician.
